code: fit <- lm(depression ~ branch(BM_predictor) + branch(age_covariate) + branch(pain_covariate) + branch(fatigue_covariate) + branch(genotype_covariate),

outlier_exclusion: "one-half_interquartile_range" ~ (((BM1 >= (quantile(BM1, probs = 0.25) - 1.5 * IQR.BM1)) & (BM1 < (quantile(BM1, probs = 0.75) + 1.5 * IQR.BM1))) & ((BM2 >= (quantile(BM2, probs = 0.25) - 1.5 * IQR.BM2)) & (BM2 < (quantile(BM2, probs = 0.75) + 1.5 * IQR.BM2))) & ((BM3 >= (quantile(BM3, probs = 0.25) - 1.5 * IQR.BM3)) & (BM3 < (quantile(BM3, probs = 0.75) + 1.5 * IQR.BM3))) & ((BM4 >= (quantile(BM4, probs = 0.25) - 1.5 * IQR.BM4)) & (BM4 < (quantile(BM4, probs = 0.75) + 1.5 * IQR.BM4))))

"two-half_sd_from_mean" ~ (((BM1 > (mean(BM1) - 2.5 * sd(BM1))) & (BM1 < (mean(BM1) + 2.5 * sd(BM1)))) & ((BM2 > (mean(BM2) - 2.5 * sd(BM2))) & (BM2 < (mean(BM2) + 2.5 * sd(BM2)))) & ((BM3 > (mean(BM3) - 2.5 * sd(BM3))) & (BM3 < (mean(BM3) + 2.5 * sd(BM3)))) & ((BM4 > (mean(BM4) - 2.5 * sd(BM4))) & (BM4 < (mean(BM4) + 2.5 * sd(BM4)))))

"three-half_sd_from_mean" ~ (((BM1 > (mean(BM1) - 3.5 * sd(BM1))) & (BM1 < (mean(BM1) + 3.5 * sd(BM1)))) & ((BM2 > (mean(BM2) - 3.5 * sd(BM2))) & (BM2 < (mean(BM2) + 3.5 * sd(BM2)))) & ((BM3 > (mean(BM3) - 3.5 * sd(BM3))) & (BM3 < (mean(BM3) + 3.5 * sd(BM3)))) & ((BM4 > (mean(BM4) - 3.5 * sd(BM4))) & (BM4 < (mean(BM4) + 3.5 * sd(BM4)))))
